text:
Howard Samuel "Trey" Thompkins III (born May 29, 1990) is an American professional basketball player. He plays for Real Madrid of the Liga ACB in Spain. He is listed as tall and he plays in the power forward position. He has also played for the Los Angeles Clippers (2011–2013) and Russian side Nizhny Novgorod (2014–2015).
On March 12, 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was announced that Thompkins had tested positive to COVID-19.
